content.div: This page explains how to launch Key2Gym after you have deployed it. See Deployment page for details on deployment.

To run the client you use a startup script located in the client's root directory. Here is an example: ./key2gym-client.sh
The following is the table of available command-line arguments:
Argument Description Example
connection
Specifies which connection to use. The value of this option is the connection's name.
./key2gym.sh --connection=default
